game.name: DISTRAINT 2
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 당신은 프라이스라는 사람으로, 맥데이드와 부르튼 그리고 무어가 운영하는 회사와 파트너쉽을 체결하기 위해 인간성을 판 인간입니다. 디스트레인트 2는 새로 생겨난 희망과 목적에 이끌려 불길한 결말을 따르기로 한 그 날, 사건이 발생하기의 맨 처음으로 돌아갑니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You are Price, a man who sold his humanity to get a partnership from a leading company: McDade, Bruton & Moore. DISTRAINT 2 follows on from the events of the first game. It's a sinister tale about restoring hope and finding your purpose.

reviewHighlights.text: Not even exaggerating one Bit! Playing your game on New year's Eve 2026 was best decision I've made this whole year! It made me reflect on my struggle...
